Desc.entry: A charity which aims to ensure the residents of Parson Cross are consulted and included in all regeneration issues for the area. Brings together statutory, voluntary and other organisations in a common effort to relieve poverty, to advance education and training, to promote and provide facilities in the interest of social welfare and for leisure time occupation. Aims to tackle the social and economic problems in existence in the area. Seeks to build the capacity of local community groups and improve the conditions of life for the residents. Self or any referral.
